title: RRR
subtitle: r-r-r
description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920's.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
subtitle: The Beginning
description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

subtitle: The Conclusion
description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920's.

title: Nayakan
description: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.
stars: Kamal Haasan - Saranya Ponvannan - Delhi Ganesh

title: C/o Kancharapalem
subtitle: love
description: Four unconventional love stories set in the town and including the people of Kancherapalem.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
subtitle: law
description: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.
